name: View4View
description: Are you still starting out your journey to become a blogger? Have only a few people watched your videos?  Got great content but dont know where or how to promote your video to a larger audience?   View4View is a free app that helps you achieve REAL views from REAL people.   How to get started? - Install the app, watch a video campaign and earn coins - Dont like the video you are watching? Just click skip and watch the next campaign - Use coins to create campaigns (provide a video link or id) and start getting views for your own videos from REAL people just like you   Note: View4View is a third party app. View4View does NOT offer the ability to buy views as it is against YT Policy. We are only a platform to help your video reach out to a larger audience, and these people have the ability to choose what videos they want to watch or they feel interested in.
